name: Francis Chi-Moon Lau
content: Francis Chi Moon Lau [Tue, 25 Feb, 4:00-5:30] Francis Chi Moon Lau Honorary Professor Dept. of Computer Science, The Univ. of Hong Kong [ Professor Lau received his BSc in CS from Acadia, and his MMath and PhD in CS from Waterloo. He joined the Dept of CS, HKU in 1987 and served as the department head from 2000-05. He is interested in systems research (both practical and theoretical), and the application of computing to arts, in particular music. He was an associate dean of the Faculty of Engineering from 2014-19, and visiting chair professor in IIIS, Tsinghua University from 2007-10 and Jinan University (Guangzhou, China) from 2016-19. Prof. Lau retired from his professor post in November 2019, when worrisome signs of the COVID-19 outbreak started to show. ] My name in Chinese My (not so) recent picture (1.2010); and this one (16.6.06), taken where I had a lot of fun.
